attributes.action: Allow the British people to know the real research into time travel
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I was last here in 2001 when I realized there was real lack of understanding but also a lot of interest in time travel. You won't have this ability until 2034 and it wouldn't be right for me to try and educate even the most eminent physicists you have today. This time I am only here for a fleeting visit and don't know enough of the technology regarding the machine, I am just here to pick up data. I urge the governments of the world to release information into the public domain so that time travel will become widely accepted and not feared.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
